definition[0]: to wake up or to make someone wake up
example[0]: She was awakened by a noise at two in the morning.
example[1]: Bill slept a little until he was awakened to take his turn on guard.
explanation[0]: In everyday English, people usually use wake up rather than awaken:
example[2]: She was woken up by the phone ringing.
definition[1]: if something awakens an emotion, interest, memory etc it makes you suddenly begin to feel that emotion etc
example[3]: Early involvement in music can awaken an interest that will last a lifetime.
